title: [K-12] Web-Based Technology-Enhanced Instructional Design for Improving EFL Cultural Awareness

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English communication skills and general cross-cultural understanding
context.additional_context: Examination of applicability to university students referencing research results from Chilean secondary EFL teachers. Utilization of mixed research methods through online surveys and interviews.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze and compare cultural perspective differences from three or more cultures using web-based tools
Learners can conduct at least two cultural exchange activities with global peers using digital collaboration tools
Learners can identify three or more challenges in designing technology-based cultural activities and propose solutions
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
